description:
Rito is shocked when she finds Mari and Kotoko stuffing their faces full of sweets. Their friend and ally Sayumi appears bringing a new crepe she wants the three of them to eat. Claiming it can grant any wish, she urges them to eat it. Realizing something has happened to her, Rito turns to face her alone, blade in hand.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ファビュラスクレープ
